title: @Wuks/Board Developers — Possible support for certain symbols?
body:
Hey everyone, as some of you may know, my name is Hotarµ.

 Unfortunately the Boards don't support Greek lettering or symbols (or is very inconsistent because sometimes it displays correctly on GD) so my name appears as Hotarm.  Yes, Hot Arm is officially my name on the Boards.

 Any chance we can get support added for Greek lettering and mathematical symbols? If it's not too much to ask.


Here's a picture of me for added pathos:
https://imgur.com/0rwIQQj.png?noredirect

replies.body: Ok. We'll look into changing from small-caps to regular capitalization.
